These #traditional wooden #bridges of NarGa (a small ethnic group of Myanmar )are wonderful. These are built using mainly bamboo, canes and woods. These can be found on Ledo street to NarGa land.﻿

Opposition leader Aung San Suu Kyi has rejected allegations that an “ethnic cleansing” of #Rohingya Muslims is taking place in Burma. #ASSK 24.10.2013
Speaking in an interview with the BBC on Thursday, the democracy icon responded to questions about a spate of communal clashes which have rippled through the country and appear to be increasingly targeting the country’s Muslim minority. - HANNA HINDSTROM (DVB)﻿
